channel.title: Prayer!
channel.description:
Hi can someone tell me why I cant recharge prayer on my server? Altars dont do anything. Also how can I change it so I can see coods and ID when I use my right mouse button? Thanks
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/6048/rightclickxr6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img177/rightclickxr6.png/1/][IMG]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/rightclickxr6.png/1/w271.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Prayer!
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

if(objectID == 10638 || objectID == 409 || objectID == 411 || objectID == 4859){ if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { sM("You already have full Prayer points."); } else { setAnimation(645); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687); sendFrame126("" + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); sendFrame126("" + playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); sM("You recharge your Prayer points."); } } if(objectID == 13180 || objectID == 13181 || objectID == 13179 || objectID == 13184){ if(playerLevel[5] == getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])) { sM("You already have full Prayer points."); }

Put that in client.cfg, then add a object in client.cfg too of one of those ids, that will work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2009, 06:43:36 am[/size][hr]obs: the sM is sendmessage, so if you got error with that, just change to what your server needs to say a message or delete it if you think its not that important.

Read full topic
